property.name: createPipelineRunQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.pipeline_run ( run_id, pipeline_id, version, start_date, end_date, parameters, status, terminating, pod_id, node_type, node_disk, node_ip, node_id, node_name, node_cloud_region, docker_image, cmd_template, actual_cmd, timeout, owner, service_url, pod_ip, ssh_password, commit_status, last_change_commit_time, config_name, node_count, parent_id, entities_ids, is_spot, configuration_id, pod_status, env_vars, prolonged_at_time, last_notification_time, exec_preferences, pretty_url, price_per_hour, state_reason, non_pause, node_real_disk, node_cloud_provider) VALUES ( :RUN_ID, :PIPELINE_ID, :VERSION, :START_DATE, :END_DATE, :PARAMETERS, :STATUS, :TERMINATING, :POD_ID, :NODE_TYPE, :NODE_DISK, :NODE_IP, :NODE_ID, :NODE_NAME, :NODE_CLOUD_REGION, :DOCKER_IMAGE, :CMD_TEMPLATE, :ACTUAL_CMD, :TIMEOUT, :OWNER, :SERVICE_URL, :POD_IP, :SSH_PASSWORD, :COMMIT_STATUS, :LAST_CHANGE_COMMIT_TIME, :CONFIG_NAME, :NODE_COUNT, :PARENT_ID, :ENTITIES_IDS, :IS_SPOT, :CONFIGURATION_ID, :POD_STATUS, to_jsonb(:ENV_VARS::jsonb), :PROLONGED_AT_TIME, :LAST_NOTIFICATION_TIME, :EXEC_PREFERENCES, :PRETTY_URL, :PRICE_PER_HOUR, :STATE_REASON, :NON_PAUSE, :NODE_REAL_DISK, :NODE_CLOUD_PROVIDER)

property.name: loadRunByIdQuery
property.value: SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.timeout, r.owner, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider, tasks.task_name IS NOT NULL as initialization_finished, FALSE as queued, pipelines.pipeline_name FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline pipelines ON (pipelines.pipeline_id = r.pipeline_id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT run_id, task_name FROM pipeline_run_log WHERE status = ? AND task_name = ?) tasks ON tasks.run_id = r.run_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT run_id, task_name FROM pipeline_run_log WHERE run_id = ? AND task_name = ?) init_node_tasks ON init_node_tasks.run_id = r.run_id WHERE r.run_id = ? ORDER BY r.start_date

property.name: loadSshPasswordQuery
property.value: SELECT r.ssh_password FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r WHERE r.run_id = ? ORDER BY r.start_date

property.name: loadAllRunsByVersionIdQuery
property.value: SELECT run_id, pipeline_id, version, start_date, end_date, parameters, status, terminating, pod_id, node_type, node_disk, node_ip, node_id, node_name, node_image, node_cloud_region, docker_image, cmd_template, actual_cmd, timeout, owner, service_url, pod_ip, commit_status, last_change_commit_time, config_name, node_count, parent_id, entities_ids, is_spot, configuration_id, pod_status, prolonged_at_time, last_notification_time, last_idle_notification_time, exec_preferences, pretty_url, price_per_hour, state_reason, non_pause, node_real_disk, node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run WHERE version = ? ORDER BY start_date

property.name: loadAllRunsByPipelineIdQuery
property.value: SELECT run_id, pipeline_id, version, start_date, end_date, parameters, status, terminating, pod_id, node_type, node_disk, node_ip, node_id, node_name, node_image, node_cloud_region, docker_image, cmd_template, actual_cmd, timeout, owner, service_url, pod_ip, commit_status, last_change_commit_time, config_name, node_count, parent_id, entities_ids, is_spot, configuration_id, pod_status, prolonged_at_time, last_notification_time, last_idle_notification_time, exec_preferences, pretty_url, price_per_hour, state_reason, non_pause, node_real_disk, node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run WHERE pipeline_id = ? ORDER BY start_date

property.name: loadAllRunsByPipelineIdAndVersionQuery
property.value: SELECT run_id, pipeline_id, version, start_date, end_date, parameters, status, terminating, pod_id, node_type, node_disk, node_ip, node_name, node_id, node_image, node_cloud_region, docker_image, cmd_template, actual_cmd, timeout, owner, service_url, pod_ip, commit_status, last_change_commit_time, config_name, node_count, parent_id, entities_ids, is_spot, configuration_id, pod_status, prolonged_at_time, last_notification_time, last_idle_notification_time, exec_preferences, pretty_url, price_per_hour, state_reason, non_pause, node_real_disk, node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run WHERE pipeline_id = ? and version = ? ORDER BY start_date

property.name: updateRunStatusQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET status = :STATUS, end_date = :END_DATE, terminating = :TERMINATING WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updateRunCommitStatusQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET commit_status = :COMMIT_STATUS, last_change_commit_time = :LAST_CHANGE_COMMIT_TIME WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updateRunInstanceQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET node_type = :NODE_TYPE, node_id = :NODE_ID, node_disk = :NODE_DISK, node_ip = :NODE_IP, node_image =:NODE_IMAGE, node_name =:NODE_NAME, is_spot =:IS_SPOT, node_real_disk =:NODE_REAL_DISK WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updateRunQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET pipeline_id = :PIPELINE_ID, version = :VERSION, start_date = :START_DATE, end_date = :END_DATE, parameters = :PARAMETERS, status = :STATUS, terminating = :TERMINATING, pod_id = :POD_ID, node_type = :NODE_TYPE, node_disk = :NODE_DISK, node_ip = :NODE_IP, node_id = :NODE_ID, node_name = :NODE_NAME, node_cloud_region = :NODE_CLOUD_REGION, docker_image = :DOCKER_IMAGE, cmd_template = :CMD_TEMPLATE, actual_cmd = :ACTUAL_CMD, timeout = :TIMEOUT, owner = :OWNER, service_url = :SERVICE_URL, pod_ip = :POD_IP, ssh_password = :SSH_PASSWORD, commit_status = :COMMIT_STATUS, last_change_commit_time = :LAST_CHANGE_COMMIT_TIME, config_name = :CONFIG_NAME, node_count = :NODE_COUNT, parent_id = :PARENT_ID, entities_ids = :ENTITIES_IDS, is_spot = :IS_SPOT, configuration_id = :CONFIGURATION_ID, pod_status = :POD_STATUS, env_vars = to_jsonb(:ENV_VARS::jsonb), prolonged_at_time = :PROLONGED_AT_TIME, last_notification_time = :LAST_NOTIFICATION_TIME, exec_preferences = :EXEC_PREFERENCES, pretty_url = :PRETTY_URL, price_per_hour = :PRICE_PER_HOUR, state_reason = :STATE_REASON, non_pause = :NON_PAUSE, node_real_disk =:NODE_REAL_DISK WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updateServiceUrlQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET service_url = :SERVICE_URL WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updatePodIPQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET pod_ip = :POD_IP WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updatePodStatusQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET pod_status = :POD_STATUS WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updateLastNotificationQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET last_notification_time = :LAST_NOTIFICATION_TIME, last_idle_notification_time = :LAST_IDLE_NOTIFICATION_TIME WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: updateProlongedAtTimeAndLastIdleNotificationTimeQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.pipeline_run SET prolonged_at_time = :PROLONGED_AT_TIME, last_idle_notification_time = :LAST_IDLE_NOTIFICATION_TIME WHERE run_id = :RUN_ID

property.name: loadRunningAndTerminatedPipelineRunsQuery
property.value: SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.timeout, r.owner, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.env_vars, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider, TRUE as initialization_finished, FALSE as queued, p.pipeline_name FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline p ON r.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id WHERE r.status = 2 or r.terminating

property.name: loadRunningPipelineRunsQuery
property.value: SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.timeout, r.owner, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider, TRUE as initialization_finished, FALSE as queued, p.pipeline_name FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline p ON r.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id WHERE r.status = 2

property.name: loadActiveServicesQuery
property.value: WITH active_run AS (SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.timeout, r.owner, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r WHERE r.status = 2 AND r.service_url IS NOT NULL ) SELECT active_run.run_id, active_run.pipeline_id, active_run.version, active_run.start_date, active_run.end_date, active_run.parameters, active_run.status, active_run.terminating, active_run.pod_id, active_run.node_type, active_run.node_disk, active_run.node_ip, active_run.node_id, active_run.node_name, active_run.node_image, active_run.node_cloud_region, active_run.docker_image, active_run.cmd_template, active_run.actual_cmd, active_run.timeout, active_run.owner, active_run.service_url, active_run.pod_ip, active_run.commit_status, active_run.last_change_commit_time, active_run.config_name, active_run.node_count, active_run.parent_id, active_run.entities_ids, active_run.is_spot, active_run.configuration_id, active_run.pod_status, active_run.prolonged_at_time, active_run.last_notification_time, active_run.last_idle_notification_time, active_run.exec_preferences, active_run.pretty_url, active_run.price_per_hour, active_run.state_reason, active_run.non_pause, active_run.node_real_disk, active_run.node_cloud_provider FROM active_run INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT run_id FROM pipeline.run_user @WHERE@ ) AS u ON (active_run.run_id = u.run_id) UNION SELECT * FROM active_run WHERE active_run.owner = :NAME ORDER BY run_id DESC LIMIT :LIMIT OFFSET :OFFSET

property.name: countActiveServicesQuery
property.value: WITH active_run AS (SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.timeout, r.owner, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r WHERE r.status = 2 AND r.service_url IS NOT NULL) SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT active_run.run_id, active_run.pipeline_id, active_run.version, active_run.start_date, active_run.end_date, active_run.parameters, active_run.status, active_run.terminating, active_run.pod_id, active_run.node_type, active_run.node_disk, active_run.node_ip, active_run.node_id, active_run.node_name, active_run.node_image, active_run.node_cloud_region, active_run.docker_image, active_run.cmd_template, active_run.actual_cmd, active_run.timeout, active_run.owner, active_run.service_url, active_run.pod_ip, active_run.commit_status, active_run.last_change_commit_time, active_run.config_name, active_run.node_count, active_run.parent_id, active_run.entities_ids, active_run.is_spot, active_run.configuration_id, active_run.pod_status, active_run.prolonged_at_time, active_run.last_notification_time, active_run.last_idle_notification_time, active_run.exec_preferences, active_run.pretty_url, active_run.price_per_hour, active_run.state_reason, active_run.non_pause, active_run.node_real_disk, active_run.node_cloud_provider FROM active_run INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT run_id FROM pipeline.run_user @WHERE@ ) AS u ON (active_run.run_id = u.run_id) UNION SELECT * FROM active_run WHERE active_run.owner = :NAME) AS run_count

property.name: loadTerminatingPipelineRunsQuery
property.value: SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.owner, r.timeout, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r WHERE r.terminating

property.name: loadRunByPrettyUrlQuery
property.value: SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.owner, r.timeout, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r WHERE r.pretty_url = ?

property.name: searchPipelineRunsBaseQuery
property.value: SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.timeout, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.owner, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider, tasks.task_name IS NOT NULL as initialization_finished, FALSE as queued, pipelines.pipeline_name FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline pipelines ON (pipelines.pipeline_id = r.pipeline_id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT run_id, task_name FROM pipeline_run_log WHERE status = :TASK_STATUS AND task_name = :TASK_NAME) tasks ON tasks.run_id = r.run_id @WHERE@ ORDER BY r.run_id DESC LIMIT :LIMIT OFFSET :OFFSET

property.name: countFilteredPipelineRunsBaseQuery
property.value: SELECT count(*) as count FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r @WHERE@

property.name: deleteRunsByPipelineQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.pipeline_run WHERE pipeline_id = ?

property.name: loadPipelineRunsWithPipelineByIdsQuery
property.value: SELECT runs.run_id, runs.pipeline_id, runs.version, runs.start_date, runs.end_date, runs.parameters, runs.status, runs.terminating, runs.pod_id, runs.node_type, runs.node_disk, runs.node_ip, runs.node_id, runs.node_name, runs.node_image, runs.node_cloud_region, runs.docker_image, runs.cmd_template, runs.actual_cmd, runs.timeout, runs.owner, runs.service_url, runs.pod_ip, runs.commit_status, runs.last_change_commit_time, runs.config_name, runs.node_count, runs.parent_id, runs.entities_ids, runs.is_spot, runs.configuration_id, runs.pod_status, runs.prolonged_at_time, runs.last_notification_time, runs.last_idle_notification_time, runs.exec_preferences, runs.pretty_url, runs.price_per_hour, runs.state_reason, runs.non_pause, runs.node_real_disk, runs.node_cloud_provider, tasks.task_name IS NOT NULL as initialization_finished, FALSE as queued, pipelines.pipeline_name FROM pipeline.pipeline_run runs LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline pipelines ON (pipelines.pipeline_id = runs.pipeline_id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT run_id, task_name FROM pipeline_run_log WHERE status = :TASK_STATUS AND task_name = :TASK_NAME) tasks ON tasks.run_id = runs.run_id WHERE runs.run_id IN (:list)

property.name: loadRunsGroupingQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE runs AS ( SELECT p.run_id, p.pipeline_id, p.version, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.parameters, p.status, p.terminating, p.pod_id, p.node_type, p.node_disk, p.node_ip, p.node_id, p.node_name, p.node_image, p.node_cloud_region, p.docker_image, p.cmd_template, p.actual_cmd, p.timeout, p.owner, p.service_url, p.pod_ip, p.commit_status, p.last_change_commit_time, p.config_name, p.node_count, p.parent_id, p.entities_ids, p.is_spot, p.configuration_id, p.pod_status, p.prolonged_at_time, p.last_notification_time, p.last_idle_notification_time, p.exec_preferences, p.pretty_url, p.price_per_hour, p.state_reason, p.non_pause, p.node_real_disk, p.node_cloud_provider FROM (SELECT * FROM pipeline_run r WHERE parent_id ISNULL @WHERE@ ORDER BY run_id DESC LIMIT :LIMIT OFFSET :OFFSET) as p UNION SELECT c.run_id, c.pipeline_id, c.version, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.parameters, c.status, c.terminating, c.pod_id, c.node_type, c.node_disk, c.node_ip, c.node_id, c.node_name, c.node_image, c.node_cloud_region, c.docker_image, c.cmd_template, c.actual_cmd, c.timeout, c.owner, c.service_url, c.pod_ip, c.commit_status, c.last_change_commit_time, c.config_name, c.node_count, c.parent_id, c.entities_ids, c.is_spot, c.configuration_id, c.pod_status, c.prolonged_at_time, c.last_notification_time, c.last_idle_notification_time, c.exec_preferences, c.pretty_url, c.price_per_hour, c.state_reason, c.non_pause, c.node_real_disk, c.node_cloud_provider FROM pipeline.pipeline_run c INNER JOIN runs ON runs.run_id = c.parent_id ) SELECT runs.run_id, runs.pipeline_id, runs.version, runs.start_date, runs.end_date, runs.parameters, runs.status, runs.terminating, runs.pod_id, runs.node_type, runs.node_disk, runs.node_ip, runs.node_id, runs.node_name, runs.node_image, runs.node_cloud_region, runs.docker_image, runs.cmd_template, runs.actual_cmd, runs.timeout, runs.owner, runs.service_url, runs.pod_ip, runs.commit_status, runs.last_change_commit_time, runs.config_name, runs.node_count, runs.parent_id, runs.entities_ids, runs.is_spot, runs.configuration_id, runs.pod_status, runs.prolonged_at_time, runs.last_notification_time, runs.last_idle_notification_time, runs.exec_preferences, runs.pretty_url, runs.price_per_hour, runs.state_reason, runs.non_pause, runs.node_real_disk, runs.node_cloud_provider, tasks.task_name IS NOT NULL as initialization_finished, FALSE as queued, pipelines.pipeline_name FROM runs LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline pipelines ON (pipelines.pipeline_id = runs.pipeline_id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT run_id, task_name FROM pipeline.pipeline_run_log WHERE status = :TASK_STATUS AND task_name = :TASK_NAME) tasks ON tasks.run_id = runs.run_id

property.name: countRunGroupsQuery
property.value: SELECT count(*) as count FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r WHERE parent_id ISNULL @WHERE@

property.name: createPipelineRunSidsQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.run_user ( run_id, name, is_principal, access_type) VALUES ( :RUN_ID, :NAME, :IS_PRINCIPAL, :ACCESS_TYPE)

property.name: loadRunSidsQuery
property.value: SELECT run_id, name, is_principal, access_type FROM pipeline.run_user WHERE run_id = ?

property.name: loadRunSidsQueryForList
property.value: SELECT run_id, name, is_principal, access_type FROM pipeline.run_user WHERE run_id IN (:list)

property.name: deleteRunSidsByRunIdQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.run_user WHERE run_id = ?

property.name: loadEnvVarsQuery
property.value: SELECT r.env_vars FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r WHERE r.run_id = ?
